If you're obese, or if you haven't been active in the past, start physical activity slowly and build up the intensity a little at a time.
                
When starting out, one way to be active is to do more everyday activities, such as taking the stairs instead of the elevator and doing household chores and yard work. The next step is to start walking, biking, or swimming at a slow pace, and then build up the amount of time you exercise
